Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/California
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Western, 99th and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Western, 99th and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
